mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where user_id = #{userId} group by user_Id

update cart set cart.cart_count = cart.cart_count-1 where cart_num = #{cartNum}
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, SUM(c.menu_price * c.cart_count) AS price, SUM(m.menu_priceOFF * c.cart_count) AS priceOff, CASE WHEN SUM((m.menu_price-m.menu_priceOff) * c.cart_count) > 40000 THEN 0 ELSE 4000 END AS delivery, CASE WHEN SUM((m.menu_price-m.menu_priceOff) * c.cart_count) >= 40000 THEN SUM(c.menu_price * c.cart_count) - SUM(m.menu_priceOFF * c.cart_count) ELSE SUM(c.menu_price * c.cart_count) - SUM(m.menu_priceOFF * c.cart_count) + 4000 END AS total FROM cart c LEFT JOIN menu m ON c.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.user_id
mapper.delete: delete from cart where Cart_num in (${cartNum})
